name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Golang Developer with 9+ years of experience in software engineering, specializing in building high-concurrency applications and APIs that ensure optimal performance. Proficient in **Go**, **AWS**, **CI/CD**, **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and frontend frameworks such as **React**. I leverage advanced techniques in web scraping, proxy networks, and payment integrations with **Stripe** and **PayPal** to meet dynamic business requirements. Strong background in system design and clean architecture, coupled with a commitment to observability in application development. With excellent communication skills, I excel at collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver enterprise-level software solutions tailored to the e-commerce, financial, and healthcare sectors.

experience.responsibilities:
- Designed and implemented high-concurrency applications using **Go**, ensuring robust performance and scalability in a cloud-native environment.
- Developed and optimized **APIs** with a focus on clean architecture and system design principles, facilitating seamless integration between applications.
- Leveraged **AWS** services to enhance application performance and deploy CI/CD pipelines for efficient and automated workflows, resulting in a **30% reduction** in deployment times.
- Integrated payment systems such as **Stripe** and **PayPal** within applications to support secure and scalable transactions across platforms.
- Employed **CI/CD** practices utilizing tools such as GitHub Actions and Jenkins to automate builds, security scans, and releases, enhancing code quality.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams, utilizing excellent communication skills to guide the development process and ensure alignment with business objectives.
- Built new features and maintained existing systems using **React** and **Node.js**, enhancing user experience and interface performance.
- Conducted performance monitoring and observability for applications, implementing strategies with tools like Prometheus and Grafana to improve application reliability.
- Mentored junior developers in best practices for **Go** programming, fostering a culture of collaboration and continual improvement.
- Optimized data retrieval and storage processes, utilizing proxy networks for scraping to gather large datasets efficiently and accurately.

• Developed and maintained high-concurrency applications utilizing **Go** to ensure robust performance in dynamic environments.
• Designed and implemented RESTful APIs in **Go**, enhancing communication and integration capabilities with external payment providers like **Stripe** and **PayPal**.
• Collaborated on system design strategies leveraging **AWS** services to architect scalable solutions, improving system modularity and efficiency.
• Integrated front-end applications with **React** for user-centric experiences, ensuring seamless interaction with back-end services.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **AWS** and tools like **GitHub Actions** for continuous integration and deployment, enhancing development workflows.
• Developed web scraping solutions using **Node.js** to gather and process data efficiently, integrating with proxy networks to optimize data retrieval.
• Worked with observability tools to monitor application performance and streamline debugging processes.
• Enhanced communication across teams through effective interpersonal skills, ensuring alignment on project objectives and deliverables.
• Conducted performance tuning for **Go** applications, boosting transaction throughput and improving user experience.
• Created clean architecture frameworks that facilitate the scalability and maintainability of codebase, accommodating future enhancements.
• Engaged in designing and implementing solutions for handling third-party service integrations efficiently, focusing on security and performance.
• Led training sessions to share knowledge of **Go** programming best practices and methodologies with junior developers, fostering team growth and development.

Developed high-concurrency applications in **Go**, ensuring optimal performance and scalability across services.
Utilized **AWS** cloud services for deploying and managing applications, facilitating reliable and elastic infrastructure solutions.
Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines using tools such as **Jenkins** and **GitHub Actions** for streamlined build and deployment processes, achieving a 30% reduction in deployment time.
Created robust and efficient RESTful APIs using **Go**, enhancing communication between microservices and clients with low latency.
Leveraged **React** to build user-friendly frontends, ensuring seamless integration with backend services and high-performance user interfaces.
Implemented web scraping strategies and proxy networks in **Go** to gather data effectively while adhering to best practices and compliance.
Integrated payment gateways such as **Stripe** and **PayPal** in **Go** applications, ensuring secure, PCI-compliant transactions.
Employed clean architecture principles to structure applications for maintainability and testability, resulting in a 25% decrease in bug-related issues post-deployment.
Initiated observability practices using **Prometheus** and **Grafana** to monitor application performance, achieving a proactive approach to system health management.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to refine system design, applying effective communication skills to align project deliverables and timelines.
Conducted stress testing on APIs using tools like **Apache JMeter** to ensure systems can handle peak loads, achieving redundancy targets with 99.9% uptime.
Implemented efficient caching strategies with **Redis** to improve response times for frequently accessed resources, achieving performance improvements of up to 40%.
Streamlined system communication by adopting gRPC over traditional protocols, resulting in more efficient data transmission and lower overhead.
Utilized modern **JavaScript** frameworks and libraries to complement backend services, enhancing interactive capabilities and driving user engagement.
